穨字的基本解释

穨
tuí
同“颓”。

穨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuí］
［《廣韻》杜回切，平灰，定。］
同“頽1”。
(1)委靡不振貌。参见“穨爾”。
(2)衰微；衰败；敝败。
(3)衰老。参见“穨年”、“穨齡”。
(4)崩塌；坠落。
(5)水向下流。
(6)从上而下的暴风。
(7)寂静。参见“穨然”。
(8)柔软。参见“穨雲”。

穨字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　穨； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页861第13
【廣韻】杜回切【集韻】徒回切，?音魋。【說文】禿貌。　又同頹。暴風也。【詩·小雅】維風及頹。【疏】孫炎曰：迴風從上下曰頹。又頹廢也。【後漢·趙咨傳】至於戰國，漸至穨陵。【註】頹廢陵遲。

穨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

穨字的起名意思

暂无。

穨
Basic explanation of words
穨
tuí
Same as "decadent".
穨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuí］
["Guang Yun" Du Hui cut, flat gray, fixed. ]
Same as "Decadent 1".
(1) Depressed appearance. See "穨尔".
(2) Decline; Decline; Unfavorable.
(3) Senescence. See "Yingnian", "Yingling".
(4) Collapse; fall.
(5) Water flows downwards.
(6) Storm from top to bottom.
(7) Silence. See "Ring Ran".
(8) Soft. See "Yingyun".
穨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [He Zi Department] 　穨; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 861 13
[Guang Yun] Du Huiqi [Ji Yun] Only Huiqi,? Sound. [Said the text] Bald appearance.　It's the same again. The storm also. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Weifeng and decadence. [Shu] Sun Yan said: Returning to the wind from the top and bottom, said slumping. It's also decadent. [Later Han·Zhao Zizhuan] As for the Warring States Period, it gradually came to Lingling. [Note] Decadent Ling Chi.
